item.title: Malaysia’s PNB Is Said to Explore Sale of Toll Road Business
item.description: Malaysia’s state-owned asset manager is considering selling its toll road unit Projek Lintasan Kota Holdings Sdn. in a deal that could be worth 3 billion ringgit ($705 million), people with knowledge
